getFeeCollector(bytes32).details: Get the `FeeCollector` contract for a given pool ID. The contract      will not actually exist until `prepareFeeCollectorToPayFees()`      has been called once.

params.poolId: The pool ID associated with the staking pool.

prepareFeeCollectorToPayFees(bytes32).details: Deploy (if needed) a `FeeCollector` contract for `poolId`      and wrap its ETH into WETH. Anyone may call this.

params.poolId: The pool ID associated with the staking pool.

FEE_COLLECTOR_INIT_CODE_HASH.details: Hash of the fee collector init code.
